A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is the beginning of the \"seen\" evolution of Star Wars. It's beautiful to see change and growth but still have the DNA of the originals\, the foundation of the mythology and as it should - the mythology grows to something that is similar yet different. It's what Zen and Chi and Prana are about. Perfect movie and not because there's no flaws but because it has matured the story as it should. Loved it\, not blindly\, but because I can see it for what it is and will be. Thank you Rian Johnson and the cast and crew that brought this into existence!
